txt.en: Argue with Thane Edric on Agelman's behalf
You discover three farmhands working amidst the fields
Ride along the road south toward Eastfold
'Are you ready to return to Entwade?'
Talk to Agelman
Talk to Agelman in the Mead Hall of Entwade
DNT
Aid Agelman in burying the people of Entwade

'You have done much to aid me and the people of Entwade, [placeholder]. My men and I will continue to ready the town for the White Hand's return, but there remains little left to do.

'Now, as for the man you found hiding in town... while he cleverly evaded my men, he will still need to rejoin with the others in Aldburg. The roads can be travelled in numbers, but I would not send him south alone - not in these times.

'If you would, travel south with Agelman, and bring him to rejoin with Léoflad and the others.'
Talk to Gyrth
Find Léoflad and the people of Entwade
Aid Agelman in returning to Entwade
Poised to repel a White Hand assault, Thane Edric demands that Agelman be taken to safety in the south with Léoflad and the people of Entwade.
Talk to TBD
You have seen no sign of Léoflad or her people and should continue riding south
DNT
Aid Agelman in the aftermath of this tragedy
Rally Agelman to your side by using the horn given to you by Thane Edric.\n\nThane Edric has asked you to bring Agelman to rejoin with his people along the road south to Aldburg.
Rally Agelman to your side
As you cross, you spy a farmhouse in the distance
Aided Agelman in returning to Entwade
Agelman rushes to your side
Agelman would like to speak with you about what he can offer the defences of Entwade.\n\nYou have been ordered to bring Agelman south to Aldburg.
Talk to Pendlac
'Ah, you have made it, [placeholder].\n\n'Edric is not well, my friend. He may seem lost in thought, but I see a blind hate building within him.'
Talk to Smála
The road to Aldburg can be reached by taking the southern fork on the road to the west of Entwade.\n\nYou have readied Agelman for the journey, and should now ride south.
The time has come to journey south
The road to Aldburg can be reached by taking the southern fork on the road to the west of Entwade.\n\nYou have found no sign of the people of Entwade, and should continue riding south.
Agelman rushes to your side
The river Snowbourn can found flowing through southern Kingstead.
You have encountered a wrecked cart, clearly here before Léoflad set off
The farmhouse can be found directly south of the river Snowbourn near the border of Eastfold and Kingstead.
Agelman rushes to your side
Agelman rushes to your side
Aided Agelman in burying the people of Entwade

'I have little time to chat, and nay, I have seen not the people you speak of.

'Why flee to Aldburg? I would think Edoras more secure. And what is to become of the Wade?

'I must make ready, excuse me.'

Agelman can be found at your side or can be rallied to you by using your horn.\n\nYou have aided Agelman as best you could, and he is now ready to set off. You should speak to Agelman before he departs.

'You have my thanks, [placeholder]. These are the grimmest of times that I have known, and I must return to Edric at once.\n\n'When you return to the Wade, seek me out... for I fear the Uruks will aim to finish what they have begun.'

The three farmhands can be found at Pendlac's Farm in south-eastern Kingstead.\n\nHaving seen no sign of Léoflad, you should speak to the three farmhands and ask if the people of Entwade have already passed through.
Talk to Agelman at Pendlac's Farm
'DNT'
Aided Agelman

'Of course I heard them pass... how could one not?

'You have a steed, aye? Well then, ride after them!'

Smála looks around, trying to catch the eye of the other farmhands.

'Brothers, we have not the time for this!'
Agelman rushes to your side
Agelman rushes to your side
Agelman rushes to your side

'Ah, I mean not to be curt, but many things must be set in order before my fellows and I ride to Edoras at Éowyn's request.\n\n'To answer you, aye. I saw them pass in the last hour at a fairly slow pace. Should you ride swiftly, you will no doubt find them along the road.'
Agelman rushes to your side
Agelman can be found inside the Mead Hall of Entwade.\n\nAgelman prepares to ride back to Thane Edric with Léoflad's body. You should ride to Entwade and meet him in the Mead Hall.
Agelman rushes to your side
'Have you prepared the horse yet?'
'Why have you come here?'
Follow the road south toward Eastfold
Léoflad and the people of Entwade can be found along the road south into Aldburg.\n\nLéoflad and her people passed very recently. You should ride swiftly to reunite Agelman with them.
'Can you not see that I am busy?'
Ford the river Snowbourn
Agelman can be found at your side or can be rallied to you by using your horn.\n\nAgelman has asked you to aid him in recovering Léoflad's body and preparing for his return to Entwade.
'What word have you from the fields?'
You have discovered a grim scene as the people of Entwade lay slain before you
Investigate the farmhouse along the road
Agelman rushes to your side

'These are the grimmest of times that I have known, [placeholder]. While I thank you for your aid, I wish our task could have been one less tragic.

'Edric must be told of what has happened, even if it wounds him greatly. All who we lost today must be mourned, and the Wade must hold in their honour!

'Meet me at Entwade, [placeholder], and it is there we shall talk more.'
Agelman rushes to your side
'What can I do for you?'
Agelman can be found near the horse at Pendlac's Farm.\n\nYou have aided Agelman in preparing to return to Entwade, and should now speak with him.
To Léoflad's Side
